description:
Seiji is holding a treasure hunt for New Year`s, and of course, Aoi and Kiyotaka are attending. But while the rest of the guests struggle to decipher the clues, a sudden party-crasher arrives...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gion ni Hibiku Kane no Ne
Le son des cloches résonnant dans Gion
The Sound of the Bell at Gion
